doc.field: Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 21
Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 21
COMMERCIAL: Thirteenth Annual Center Garden Party

1. Lesbian and Gay News: Andy Humm and Ann Northrop discuss recent general events that relate to the LGBT community. Includes footage of [Christine Quinn, Executive Director of the Anti-Violence Project], and Tom Duane, NYC Council Member, at Sheridan Square for celebration of Colorado Amendment 2 [Romer v. Evans] decision.
2. At the Sheridan Square celebration event, Lou Maletta interviews Suzanne Goldberg, of the Lambda Legal Defense and Education Fund, regarding the Colorado Amendment 2 [Romer v. Evans] decision.
COMMERCIAL: Homo Xtra, "The one. The only. The original."
COMMERCIAL: Dan Gendron, Horologist, "Stop paying too much for antique watches"
COMMERCIAL: Ad Council, Earth Share, "It's a connected world."

3. Footage of press conference for Vice President Al Gore at NY Hilton Hotel. Includes footage of Arlene Kochman, of SAGE; Danny Dromm and Maritza Martinez, activists from Queens; Dick Dadey, of Empire State Pride Agenda; Vivian Shapiro, of the Legacy Fund; Deborah Glick, NYS Assembly Member; Ron Johnson, NYC AIDS Czar; and Keith Cylar, of Housing Works.
COMMERCIAL: "Panic Disorder: It's real. It's treatable", National Institute of Mental Health
5. Footage of 11th annual AIDS Walk New York 1996.
6. Interview: Leif Green, AIDS Walk Producer, discusses the Walk.

7. Footage of the 10th Annual Emery Awards, the Hetrick-Martin Institute (HMI). Includes footage of Peggy Northrop, Board Member of the HMI; Jeffrey Banks; Stan Herman; Vivian Shapiro; Rabbi Sharon Kleinbaum; Clyde Jones; Andy Humm, recipient of the A. Damien Martin Award; Kevin Cathcart.
COMMERCIAL: New York Lesbian and Gay Film Festival

9. Lou Maletta interviews [unnamed], regarding the 8th annual New York Lesbian and Gay Film Festival. Includes clips of films "Everything Relative", "Men Maniacs: The Legacy of Leather", and "Scream Teen Scream".
